name.japanese: パンクハザード - 廃墟の研究所

description: The ruined section of Caesar's laboratory on Punk Hazard where Nami and Usopp attempt to protect the children from Caesar.

keyEvents.title: Caesar Arrives at Ruined Lab
keyEvents.description: Caesar arrives to retrieve the children from Nami and Usopp.
keyEvents.significance: The location of the main confrontation of the episode.

keyEvents.title: Caesar Demonstrates Oxygen Removal
keyEvents.description: Caesar suffocates Nami and Usopp by removing oxygen from the air.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the danger of fighting Caesar in an enclosed space.

keyEvents.title: Brownbeard's Intervention
keyEvents.description: Brownbeard appears to save Nami and Usopp and confront Caesar.
keyEvents.significance: The ruined lab becomes the site of Brownbeard's turning point.

keyEvents.title: Caesar Defeats the Straw Hats
keyEvents.description: Caesar uses Gastanet to knock out Nami and Usopp, securing the children.
keyEvents.significance: Caesar successfully captures the children from this location.

name.japanese: パンクハザード - 氷の大地

description: The frozen half of Punk Hazard where Zoro's group flees from Smiley, which converges and begins its transformation into Shinokuni.

keyEvents.title: Zoro's Group Flees from Smiley
keyEvents.description: Zoro, Sanji, Brook, and Kin'emon continue running from Smiley as it converges on the ice lands.
keyEvents.significance: The ice lands become the site of Smiley's transformation.

keyEvents.title: Smiley Eats the Giant Candy
keyEvents.description: Smiley swallows the giant candy placed on the ice lands.
keyEvents.significance: The catalyst for Smiley's transformation into Shinokuni is consumed here.

keyEvents.title: Smiley's Transformation Begins
keyEvents.description: Smiley begins dissolving into deadly petrifying gas on the ice lands.
keyEvents.significance: The ice lands become ground zero for the Shinokuni threat.

description: Caesar Clown's airship from which he boards the children and broadcasts his weapons demonstration to underworld brokers across the New World.

keyEvents.title: Caesar's Broadcast to New World Brokers
keyEvents.description: Caesar broadcasts his weapons demonstration announcement from his airship.
keyEvents.significance: The airship serves as Caesar's mobile command center for the demonstration.

statusHistory.reason: Airship debuts and is used for Caesar's operations
